unnormalised: Arre bhai, Labor Law! Mhonnllear "labor" korunk boreborem gunthgollo zalo, nhoi mhunn? Mhozo chacha, Faridabadantlo ek lhan karkhaneacho dhoni, taka notis aili minimum podd'do diunk nasl'leak - dista Rs. 12,000 atam purona mhunn! Atam to matyeavinnem kombddem bhaxen bhonvta, Industrial Disputes Act-acho Sec. 25F somzunk sodhta. Hovuy tannem fokot soglleank Diwali bonus â‚¹5000 divonk zai aslem ani tea divsa purto ulo marunk zai aslem. Kanunachi trasam, mhann, tim kednach somponant!
normalised: Arre bhai, Labour kaido! Mhonnlear "labour" karun ghonchollant poddpi bhaxen dista, nhoi? Mhozo chacha, Faridabadant ek lhan factory choloita, taka notice ailea, minimum poiso dila na mhonnun - dista barah hazar rupiya purona aizkal! Atam to mathyo naslolo kombdo bhaxen bhonta, Industrial Disputes Act-achem Section twenty five F somzonk sodta. Kiteak taka panch hazar rupiyanche Diwali bonus diun ek dis sompounk mellonaslo? Kaydyache dukhdok, mon'xa, tankam sontos na!
